page.title: 07BUILTH (W): ATTITUDES
page.content: The opinions of two elderly people: A LADY:She has lived in Builth all her life,except for 7 years in the army. She sees that there are now a lot more houses in Builth,but the scenery has not changed.She generally likes Builth,except for the vandalism, and there is not much of that. She does all of her shopping in Builth.She uses the buses when they run,but thinks that there are not enough of them A GENTLEMAN: He lives on the outskirts of Builth (W).He thinks that the people and buildings have changed a lot.He likes Builth because there is no pollution. He does all of his food shopping in Builth,but finds prices very expensive.He travels by bus to Hereford,to shop for clothes.He thinks Builth is a homely community.
